hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e
COV_JS=false
echo "Cleanup build" rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/ rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/ rm -rf cov-int/ rm -rf cov-build.tar.gz ./mach clobber
export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j2" EOF
cat <<EOF > config/user_nodefs.h #ifndef USER_NODEFS_H #define USER_NODEFS_H #nodef MOZ_ASSERT #endif EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
. /var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/env
echo "Rebuild all" #cov-configure --gcc --xml-option=skip_file:"(\/tmp\/.*\.(cpp|cc|c))|(\/usr\/.*)|(mozilla\/.*)" cov-configure --gcc --xml-option=skip_file:"/tmp/.*\.(cpp|cc|c)" --xml-option=skip_file:"conftest\.c*" --xml-option=skip_file:"conftest\.c.*" if test $COV_JS == true; then cov-configure --javascript fi
#--fs-capture-search $(pwd) OPTIONS="" if test $COV_JS == true; then OPTIONS="$OPTIONS --fs-capture-search $(pwd)" fi
cov-build --dir cov-int $OPTIONS ./mach --log-no-times build -v
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=190000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-fx.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi rm -r cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu exit 0
